DOC.brief_summary: This international observational multicentre study conduct Germany , Spain , Italy USA . The main objective study evaluate relative effectiveness dronedarone real world clinical practice versus anti-arrhythmic agent interest . The design study historic-prospective cohort dynamic exposure stratify competitive recruitment balance comparison group dronedarone versus alternative antiarrhythmic drug interest .
DOC.criteria: Patient 18 year old Patient paroxysmal persistent atrial fibrillation Patient use AAi ( antiarrhythmic drug interest ) dronedarone ( index drug ) Patient 's treatment change one AAi another AAi dronedarone OR antiarrhythmic therapy start AAi dronedarone therapy previous 6 month date recruitment Patient least 6 month medical treatment information prior start index drug Patient able answer telephone interview language participate country : English , German , Italian Spanish ( without proxy ) . Patient heart failure ( NYHA class IV ) Patient permanent Atrial Fibrillation Patient psychiatric condition prevent participation study accord physician
